Name: Topang
About the game: An adventure platforming game that spans 3 separate main characters' introduction stories. Help an alien named GB catch a strange fungal gastropod, or help Berl, an other-dimensional being climb to the heavens. An odd entity referred to as Skom could use some help as well. A 2-Player combat versus mode is featured containing 15 playable fighters. Each fighter possesses over 20 different attacks, including 6 unique special attacks. - 3 Different Main Character Story Lines - 2 Player Combat Versus Mode - 15 Playable Versus Fighters - Over 20 Moves Used by Each Character - 6 Unique Special Attacks per Character Must have 2 controllers for Multiplayer.
